description:
Facilitate the summarization of and analysis of data describing the abundance of steelhead crossing Lower Granite Dam July - June the subsequent year, the spatial distribution of spawning fish, and known fates/disposition in specific populations.

South Fork Clearwater Population

Lochsa River Population

Little Salmon River Population 

South Fork Salmon River Population,

North Fork Salmon River Population

Lemhi River Population

Pahsimeroi River Population

East Fork Salmon River Population

Upper Salmon River Population
